message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500. I believe it offers immense value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $8,200 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
